original_text: And ere the lamp of God went out in the temple of the Lord, where the ark of God was, and Samuel was laid down to sleep;
korean_text: 하나님의 등불은 아직 꺼지지 아니하였으며 사무엘은 하나님의 궤 있는 여호와의 전 안에 누웠더니

sentences.original_text: And ere the lamp of God went out
in the temple of the Lord
where the ark of God was
and Samuel was laid down to sleep
